thread.title: Palestinian fury fuels random attacks and skirmishes
thread.title_full: Video: Palestinian fury fuels random attacks and skirmishes | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Palestinian fury fuels random attacks and skirmishes
text: In another day of violence, Israeli police reported that an Arab attacker stabbed a 70-year-old woman at a bus station, while in Bethlehem, dozens of Palestinian protesters clashed with Israeli troops. Gwen Ifill gets an update from special correspondent Martin Seemungal, who is in Jerusalem, about the high tensions over the unorganized, random attacks and Israelâ€™s punishing security response.
